General.Name: Genohco Inc.
General.Description: Genohco, Inc. operates in the unmanned system, satellite communications, aerospace, and avionics markets. It offers electronic system for autonomous unmanned submersible; unmanned aerial vehicle intergrated mission computer; teaching pendant of the control box for use in robots; surveillance reconnaissance sensor network products; avionic UGS/UGS communication repeaters; automatic test equipment for unmanned products and aerospace/avionics. The company also provides satellite communication terminal RF and antenna systems; satellite alarm systems; satellite system network simulators; satellite test system electronic test grounds; modulators for satellite image data transmission; satellite electronic optical payload X-band transmitters; EGSE inspection test equipment for the performance of various satellite communication equipment; and automatic test equipment for satellite communication products and other markets. In addition, it offers inter-communication systems; distribution amplifiers; interference blanking units; X-band modulators for satellite image data transmission; and optical Hybrid power and fiber optic cable assemblies. The company was founded in 2004 and is headquartered in Anyang-si, South Korea.
